title: Analyze Fire Flow Test Data
description: An engineer is analyzing data from a fire flow test to ensure the water system can provide adequate flow for firefighting at a new commercial development.

tasks.description: Input the data from the fire flow test, including static pressure, residual pressure, and flow rate from the test hydrant.
tasks.expected_outcome: System correctly ingests the field test data.

tasks.description: Calculate the theoretical flow available at the required minimum residual pressure (e.g., 20 psi).
tasks.expected_outcome: System calculates the available fire flow in gallons per minute (GPM).

tasks.description: Compare the calculated available flow to the local fire code requirements for that type of building.
tasks.expected_outcome: System confirms the available flow meets the fire code requirements.
